member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.ToHexString(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with uppercase hex characters. Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array and the number of elements in the array to convert.

member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.ToHexStringLower(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with lowercase hex characters. Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array and the number of elements in the array to convert.

member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.ToHexString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with uppercase hex characters.

member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.ToHexStringLower(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with lowercase hex characters.

member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.ToHexString(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Converts a span of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with uppercase hex characters.

member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.ToHexStringLower(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Converts a span of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with lowercase hex characters.

member.summary: Converts a span of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent span representation that is encoded with uppercase hex characters.

member.summary: Converts a span of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent span representation that is encoded with lowercase hex characters.

member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.FromHexString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string, which encodes binary data as hex characters, to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer array.

member.name: M:Polyfills.ConvertPolyfill.FromHexString(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char})
member.summary: Converts the span, which encodes binary data as hex characters, to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer array.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllBytes(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Appends the specified byte array to the end of the file at the given path. If the file doesn't exist, this method creates a new file. If the operation is canceled, the task will return in a canceled state.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllBytes(System.String,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Appends the specified byte array to the end of the file at the given path. If the file doesn't exist, this method creates a new file. If the operation is canceled, the task will return in a canceled state.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously appends the specified byte array to the end of the file at the given path. If the file doesn't exist, this method creates a new file. If the operation is canceled, the task will return in a canceled state.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.Move(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves a specified file to a new location, providing the options to specify a new file name and to replace the destination file if it already exists.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllBytesAsync(System.String,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously appends the specified byte array to the end of the file at the given path. If the file doesn't exist, this method creates a new file. If the operation is canceled, the task will return in a canceled state.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllLinesAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously appends lines to a file, and then closes the file. If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllLinesAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously appends lines to a file by using a specified encoding, and then closes the file. If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllText(System.String,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char})
member.summary: Appends the specified string to the file, creating the file if it does not already exist.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllText(System.String,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Char},System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Appends the specified string to the file, creating the file if it does not already exist.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllTextAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a file or creates the file if it does not already exist, appends the specified string to the file using the specified encoding, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllTextAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a file or creates the file if it does not already exist, appends the specified string to the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllTextAsync(System.String,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Char},System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a file or creates the file if it does not already exist, appends the specified string to the file using the specified encoding, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.AppendAllTextAsync(System.String,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Char},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a file or creates the file if it does not already exist, appends the specified string to the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.ReadAllBytesAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a binary file, reads the contents of the file into a byte array, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.ReadAllLinesAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a text file, reads all lines of the file, and then closes the file.

member.summary: Asynchronously opens a text file, reads all lines of the file with the specified encoding, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.ReadAllTextAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a text file, reads all the text in the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.ReadAllTextAsync(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a text file, reads all text in the file with the specified encoding, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.ReadLinesAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the lines of a file.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.ReadLinesAsync(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the lines of a file that has a specified encoding.

member.name: M:Polyfills.FilePolyfill.WriteAllBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new file, writes the specified byte array to the file, and then closes the file. If the target file already exists, it is truncated and overwritten.

member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new file, writes the specified byte array to the file, and then closes the file. If the target file already exists, it is truncated and overwritten.

member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new file, write the specified lines to the file by using the specified encoding, and then closes the file.

member.name: T:TimeZoneConverter.LinkResolution
member.summary: Provides options for how links are resolved when returning results from converting from a Windows zone to an IANA zone.

member.name: F:TimeZoneConverter.LinkResolution.Default
member.summary: Return an IANA canonical value for the conversion, except for the case when an alias is more regionally appropriate for the conversion.
member.remarks: Ex: "India Standard Time" => "Asia/Kolkata" "SA Western Standard Time" (AG) => "America/Antigua"

member.name: F:TimeZoneConverter.LinkResolution.Canonical
member.summary: Always return an IANA canonical value.
member.remarks: This was the default behavior prior to version 6.0. Ex: "India Standard Time" => "Asia/Kolkata" "SA Western Standard Time" (AG) => "America/Puerto_Rico"

member.name: F:TimeZoneConverter.LinkResolution.Original
member.summary: Always return the original value from the CLDR mapping, without attempting to resolve it to the IANA canonical form.
member.remarks: Ex: "India Standard Time" => "Asia/Calcutta" "SA Western Standard Time" (AG) => "America/Antigua"

member.name: T:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert
member.summary: Converts time zone identifiers from various sources.

member.name: P:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.KnownIanaTimeZoneNames
member.summary: Gets a collection of all IANA time zone names known to this library.

member.name: P:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.KnownWindowsTimeZoneIds
member.summary: Gets a collection of all Windows time zone IDs known to this library.

member.name: P:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.KnownRailsTimeZoneNames
member.summary: Gets a collection of all Rails time zone names known to this library.

member.name: P:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.KnownIanaCanonicalNames
member.summary: Gets a collection of all IANA canonical time zone names known to this library.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.GetIanaTimeZoneNamesByTerritory(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a dictionary that has an sorted collection of IANA time zone names keyed by territory code.
member.param: When set true, each territory contains the full list zones applicable to that territory. Otherwise, the list is condensed to only those typically needed for selecting a time zone.
member.returns: The dictionary of territories and time zone names.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.IanaToWindows(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an IANA time zone name to the equivalent Windows time zone ID.
member.param: The IANA time zone name to convert.
member.exception: Thrown if the input string was not recognized or has no equivalent Windows zone.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.TryIanaToWindows(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert an IANA time zone name to the equivalent Windows time zone ID.
member.param: The IANA time zone name to convert.
A Windows time zone ID.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.WindowsToIana(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Windows time zone ID to an equivalent IANA time zone name.
member.param: The Windows time zone ID to convert.
An optional two-letter ISO Country/Region code, used to get a a specific mapping. Defaults to "001" if not specified, which means to get the "golden zone" - the one that is most prevalent.
member.exception: Thrown if the input string was not recognized or has no equivalent IANA zone.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.WindowsToIana(System.String,TimeZoneConverter.LinkResolution)
member.summary: Converts a Windows time zone ID to an equivalent IANA time zone name.
member.param: The Windows time zone ID to convert.
The mode of resolving links for the result.
member.exception: Thrown if the input string was not recognized or has no equivalent IANA zone.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.WindowsToIana(System.String,System.String,TimeZoneConverter.LinkResolution)
member.summary: Converts a Windows time zone ID to an equivalent IANA time zone name.
member.param: The Windows time zone ID to convert.
An optional two-letter ISO Country/Region code, used to get a a specific mapping. Defaults to "001" if not specified, which means to get the "golden zone" - the one that is most prevalent.
The mode of resolving links for the result.
member.exception: Thrown if the input string was not recognized or has no equivalent IANA zone.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.TryWindowsToIana(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert a Windows time zone ID to an equivalent IANA time zone name. Uses the "golden zone" - the one that is the most prevalent.
member.param: The Windows time zone ID to convert.
An IANA time zone name.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.GetTimeZoneInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a object given a valid Windows or IANA time zone identifier, regardless of which platform the application is running on.
member.param: A valid Windows or IANA time zone identifier.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.TryGetTimeZoneInfo(System.String,System.TimeZoneInfo@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a object given a valid Windows or IANA time zone identifier, regardless of which platform the application is running on.
member.param: A valid Windows or IANA time zone identifier.
A object.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.TryGetIanaCanonicalName(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to resolve the IANA canonical name given an IANA time zone name.
member.param: The IANA time zone name to resolve.
The resolved IANA canonical time zone name.
member.remarks: The resolving will succeed whether the input name is an alias or a canonical name.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.IanaToRails(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an IANA time zone name to one or more equivalent Rails time zone names.
member.param: The IANA time zone name to convert.
member.returns: One or more equivalent Rails time zone names.
member.exception: Thrown if the input string was not recognized or has no equivalent Rails zone.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.TryIanaToRails(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String}@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert an IANA time zone name to one or more equivalent Rails time zone names.
member.param: The IANA time zone name to convert.
One or more equivalent Rails time zone names.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.RailsToIana(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Rails time zone name to an equivalent IANA time zone name.
member.param: The Rails time zone name to convert.
member.exception: Thrown if the input string was not recognized or has no equivalent IANA zone.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.TryRailsToIana(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert a Rails time zone name to an equivalent IANA time zone name.
member.param: The Rails time zone name to convert.
An IANA time zone name.
